title: The default value set in list box of report parameter lost after modifying the default value
description:
Description: The default value set in the list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.

Steps to reproduce: 
1. Create a report parameter and set the Display type to List Box.
2. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc', and set 'aa' as the default value. Click OK.
3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog. Modify 'aa' to 'aaa' and click OK directly.
4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog.

OB: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.

EB: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter should not be lost after modifying the default value.

SR: 
1. Create a report parameter and set the Display type to List Box.
2. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc', and set 'aa' as the default value. Click OK.
3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog. Modify 'aa' to 'aaa' and click OK directly.
4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog. Verify that the default value is still set as 'aaa'.
